pages.text: Were not My signs read to you? But you used to deny them
They will say, "Our Fosterer! our misfortune prevailed over us and we became a misguided people
Our Fosterer ! take us out of this, if we again return (to evil) then we will certainly be unjust
He will say, "Go away into it and do not speak to Me
There was a party from among My servants who said: Our Fosterer ! we believe, so protectively forgive us and have mercy on us and you are the Best of those who are merciful
But you took them as a ridicule to the extent that they made you forget (even) My remembrance and you used to laugh at (some) of them
I have rewarded them this day because they were patient, they are certainly the achievers (of success)
He will say, "How long did you stay in the earth, counting in years
They will say, "We stayed for a day or part of a day but ask those who keep the account
He will say, "You did not stay but a little, had you but known
Did you then think that We created you without any purpose and that you will not be returned to Us
So Highly Exalted is Allah the Real King, there is no god except Him, Lord of the honoured throne (of the universe)

And he who prays to another (presumed) god along with Allah, having no proof with him of it (being a god), then (the responsibility of taking) his account (rests) only on Allah. The infidels will certainly not be successful
And say, "My Fosterer! protectively forgive and have mercy and You are the Best of those who are merciful
